inclusion.criterion: Invasive breast cancer diagnosed with core needle biopsy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ER/PR positive cells ratio <10%, or HER2 positive (according to ASCO-CAP guidelines),and with chemotherapy indications
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Without chemotherapy contraindications, and planned or has started neoadjuvant chemotherapy (HER2 positive breast cancer neoadjuvant anti-HER2 treatment, or have adjuvant anti-HER2 treatment plan)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: With axillary sentinel lymph node biopsy indications confirmed prior to neoadjuvant therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Voluntarily join the study and sign an informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Recieved any form of surgery of primary tumor or axillary lymph nodes
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has invasive breast cancer diagnosed with core needle biopsy, staging cT1b-2N0M0, and ER/PR positive cells ratio <10% or HER2 positive. She is planned to receive neoadjuvant chemotherapy.
